body.name: Microfiber Spray Mop for Floor Cleaning Dry Wet Dust Mop for Kitchen Wood Floor Hardwood Laminate Ceramic Tiles 360 Degree Mop Set with 6 Mop Heads Replacement 1 Scraper 1 Mop Holder 500ML Bottle
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 3 hrs 41 mins
features: 【Clean Every Corner of Your Home with Ease】This wet spray mop is equipped with a 360° flexible rotating floor mop head with a thin flat design. You can easily control this hardwood floor mop to rotate flexibly around furniture and chair legs, and the thin flat design of the spray mop head is helpful to clean deep into the low space under the furniture. No more moving heavy furniture, easy to operate, this floor spray mop is great for cleaning all the hard-to-reach corners of your home.

【Wet & Dry Spray Mop】The mop comes with two different kind of washable pads to achieve wet and dry cleaning in one mop. Chenille pads is super water absorption, perfect for dry mop；Microfiber mop pads is easy to absorbed the smallest dirt and dust, perfect for wet mop .Buying one means you have a dry mop and a wet mop at the same time.

【360° Rotation head】360° rotating washable mop head, reach out every corner of your house, Make cleaning easier. Ideal for eliminating the most stubborn dirt on your wall, windows, living room, ceiling, under furniture and even corners hard to reach. bring you a tidy environment.

【Add your favorite cleaning solution】Just fill 500ml refillable bottle with water and add 2 small teaspoons of your favorite cleaning solution and you are ready to shine your floors. NOTE: it is normal if there is a small amount of water inside the pipe, Because of our mop was tested with water spray before packaging to ensure that you can use them normally . And if you have any problem, contact us .

【1+5=6PCS Washable Reusable Pads】Our mops for floor cleaning includes 6 replacement mop pads which made of dense microfiber that absorb and lock in dirt, dust, hair, animal fur and moisture while gently protecting your floors and furniture. These reusable mop pads of laminate floor mop are soft, water-absorbing, durable and more economical than disposable cleaning pads. When refillable spray mop pads get dirty, you could wash them by machine or hand, and they can be wash over 100 times.

【Quick Assembly 】 microfiber mop pad attaches easily to the mop head with velcro for a snug fit. Just snap the parts into place and follow the steps to attach the mop head and mop body together. Fill the bottle, pull the trigger to release the spray mist, and start mopping effortlessly. Upgraded sprayer ensures long-term use. Perfect for any occasions, kitchen, bathroom, etc.

【Warm tips】1.Please don't fill boiling or impurity water, strong acid,alkali detergent into the bottle of the wet mop.2.Please fully dilute solutions with plain water,because concentrated solutions may corrode mop internal parts or some floor types. 3. There are two small silicone plugs on the bottle cap of our spray mop. Please be careful not to lose them when cleaning the bottle to prevent the bottle from leaking.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Are you still using a traditional mop? -Need to use a bulky bucket to mop the floor！ - Feel exhausted after mopping the floor ！ It always spending too much time in doing house cleaning ? The spray bottle is too small, so you have to refill it many times that you can get a area clean done ？ Leaking spray bottle after use ? After a lot of market research, BUUROOHM's New generation spray mops are designed to better meet your needs. Have a powerful mop can not only make your cleaning easier, also save most of your cleaning time. - If you are looking for such a mop now. - If you haven’t found a satisfactory mop after many attempts. Please stop your steps.

360° Rotating Mop Head 360° rotation allows you to clean any corner, Makes cleaning easier.No more achy muscles or back strain from stretching or twisting your body to reach difficult areas. Let the spray mop do the work for you! You can also use it for window cleaning ect. 500ml Large capacity You don't need to refill it many times that you can get a area clean done .Get rid of the bulky bucket.Besides, the water bottles adopt a special buckle design, not leak. Add Your Favorite Cleaning Solution No more buying expensive detergent solution refills.BUUROOHM Spray mop refillable bottle allow fill it with any cleaning solution you want.Just add 2 small teaspoons of cleaning solution to water in the bottle and you are ready to shine your floors. Use for Wet Mop or Dry Mop Spray mop comes with 6 microfiber pads, which has super dust removal and water absorption.When using it, you can use it either as a dry mop or as a wet mop.Easy to store, There is a mop holder of the package, you can hang it on the wall when not in use.

Reusable Washable Pads Reusable, save money and reduce the use of disposable mop pads.You can clean it manually with a cleaning scraper or use machine wash. Microfiber Mop Pads Super absorbent, lock water, clean three in one. Clean floor deeply without damaging it.Reusable Washable Mop Pads Refills Fit for Swiffer Power Mop. Cleaning scraper A cleaning helper, You can use it to clean the hair on the mop pads, remove excess water, and clean up stubborn stains on the ground.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smart Design, light and yet sturdy
reviews.reviewText: I have a all tile floor in the house and we have tried and used a number of different products over the years to keep the tiles clean. I like this small, light weight spray mop. It is light and feel very sturdy when mopped the whole house. The spray is very powerful and easy to use. I was intrigued with the spray mechanism, but I could not figure it out. It came with 4 easily removable pads and all together is enough to clean my whole house. I then threw the 4 pads together with a couple of rugs to the washing machine to clean up.I think this works well with any hard surface floor and I recommend that you give it a try.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Adequate for its purpose.
reviews.reviewText: I needed a mop for our trailer and was interested in something that would clean easily and not cost much up front, or throughout the time that I had it. I ordered a BUUROOHM spray mop cleaner. The microfiber spray mop is designed for home, or business use. It has a flexible rotation mop head to reach difficult spots with its 360 degree rotation while measuring 17” long X 5” wide. The mop cleans hardwood, laminate, or tile floors. It comes with a dry cleaning mop, 6 washable, reusable pads, and a 500 ml (16.9 oz) bottle, 1 scraper, 1 mop holder that will hold up to 22 lbs.I really do like the pads because they also attract hair, dust, and oils, and absorb fluids. The microfiber pads adhere to the Velcro tightly on the bottom of the mop. The mop itself is really easy to use. You need only be pull the Then the pads can be machine washed after use. When you want to use the spray mop, squeeze the handle to release the cleaning fluid. You do need to make your own spray cleaner and it is recommended that you not use hot water or strong chemicals in the cleaning bottle since this could cause the bottle to become damaged. So you should definitely mix your cleaning mix with warm, or cold water before adding to bottle.The only time that I wasn’t totally sure about my mop is when it first arrived at my home. As I was opening the super compact box, I noticed that the instructions were printed on the end of the box. They weren’t difficult to follow, just a bit awkward to have to look at the end of the box for each step. I would have preferred a printed piece of paper inside the box. Thankfully the pieces went together easily, but I’m not totally sure how long that the mop will last. It doesn’t seem to be of very high quality. But I do think that it will be just fine for what its purpose is for, which is cleaning the floors in our trailer. It works just fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use super light
reviews.reviewText: I bought this mop, which is very easy to assemble and comes with instructions.It came with a total of 4pcs of microfiber pads, one of which was glued to the mop head. It also came with a scraper, The black stuff on the floor was completely gone. My favorite part is the furry part on the microfiber pad, it’s so friendly to families with pets.The water spray effect is very good. I can clean my entire house with little water. It is also very light overall， and also suitable for my aunt ,I plan to buy one for her. I hung the mop in the corner, thanking the merchant for giving me the hook.Great product, smart buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This product is fantastic
reviews.reviewText: I recently upgraded to this spray mop, and it has completely transformed my cleaning routine.The build quality and the microfiber mop stick mechanism are miles ahead of my old mop. The difference is stark! Unlike my previous mop that felt flimsy and lacked efficiency, my new mop boasts exceptional craftsmanship. The microfiber mop stick is absorbent, holding onto water efficiently without getting soaked easily.One of the standout features for me is the inclusion of additional mop heads. This thoughtful addition allows me to use multiple mops while some are in the wash. It's a small but impactful detail.The misting effect of the spray is genius. Unlike other mops that spray water in a forceful stream, this mop gently mists, preventing excessive water usage. This not only ensures thorough cleaning but also facilitates quicker drying of the floors. It's an absolute game-changer, and I'm genuinely impressed by how efficiently it helps in maintaining dry floors post-cleaning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Overall for the price of the mop it’s pretty good . There are a few things I would change but the pros definitely outweigh the cons.The prosIt’s lightweightLarge spray areaLarge mop head to clean a bigger area at oncePivoting 360 mop head to get in small spacesUse Wet or dry6 microfiber washable padsConsHard to remove bottle to refillNo cushion on handle , hurts my handThe mop came in a small box and pieces were all separate as pictured. It was pretty easy to assemble, most pieces just snap together . It comes with an attachment that you can hang in your broom closet or wall to hang it up which is nice. The mop itself is lightweight and a lot smaller than expected but the coverage area is great . The bottle that holds the cleaning solution is small so depending on how big your home is you may have to fill each mop. It is hard to remove to refill though . I did struggle with that as there is no where to grip it .The microfiber mop pads are great, they do a great job of pulling up the dirt and do not leave the floors overly wet when mopping . It comes with a small brush attachment , I wasn’t sure what it was for until I looked back at pictures. I believe they recommend using it to scrape off hairs on the mop pads. It may also be nice to scrub tough dirt or stuck on food when mopping.As mentioned in the cons there is no cushion on the handle and after a few minutes it started ti get painful as it’s a hard plastic . I had to wear a glove when mopping so my hand didn’t hurt . That is the reason for not giving five stars .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love it
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This a really good mop it cleans my floor well. Better than my swifter. The mop sprays good and wide. The stick is sturdy unlike my swifter when I put pressure it I can see it bend a little.

The media could not be loaded. Ok so at first I was nervous because it comes it parts and I do not like assembling things nor am I good at it. HOWEVER instructions were easy and it was pretty straightforward. I got it done in max 4 minutes.👌The spray squish part on the handle does take a bit of a squeeze to use. The spray function pans out not just straight. You can use it for cleaning wall or ceilings.It comes with 4 reusable pads, a 360ML refillable bottle, 1 scraper, and 1 mop holder. 💥 The mix of hard plastic and aluminum poles makes it strong enough BUT NOT HEAVY. The handle is designed to be comfy and easy to hold. You can even hang it up when you're done using it and comes with hang up attatchment. – it works on all kinds of floors like hardwood, laminate wood, and ceramic tiles. Plus, you can use it to clean walls or ceilings. This is a lightweight and easy-to-use spray mop.

Great spray mop. The ability to reuse the pads and use your own cleaning solution makes it a great value vs something like a s”Wetjet” where you need need to purchase the refills.What I like: It’s light. It’s well made and fits together well. It’s easy to use. It comes with six reusable pads. You can use your own cleaning solution.To consider: The reservoir is pretty small so you need to refill it often. Pads can leave streaks.

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to store and use mop! takes the hassle out of mopping floors
reviews.reviewText: Set up is a breeze, and it can fit in a small space when put away.I love the spray feature as i can dampen the pad and spray as needed instead of having to go back and dampen the pad again. It definitely helps get the job done quicker.It feels sturdy and I have had no issues with the spray.Having 4 extra pads is just great as i can throw the used ones in the laundry and dont have to get to washing them right away!!

The spray mop is very easy to assemble. It comes with an extra pair of mop head. It is very sturdy and I can apply pressure very well. I can remove the mop head and throw them in the washer and reuse again. The spray tank can hold enough for a month’s worth of cleaning solution.
Loved it! But after 2 days the spray blocked and wouldn't work 😏. I tried to flush it, rinse it but nothing helped. Had to return it
